Scene - Class in main.java.scene
The Scene class represents a 3D scene composed of objects, lights, and a camera for rendering.

Constructs a new scene with the specified image dimensions.
Scene.Intersection - Class in main.java.scene
The Intersection class represents a point of intersection between a ray and an object in the scene.
SceneBuilder - Class in main.java.scene
The SceneBuilder class is used to construct a Scene by adding lights, objects, and configuring a camera.
SceneBuilder(int, int) - Constructor for class main.java.scene.SceneBuilder
Constructs a new SceneBuilder with the specified image dimensions.
SceneObject - Class in main.java.object

SceneParser - Class in main.java.scene
The SceneParser class is used to parse a scene description file and construct a Scene object based on the file's content.
